channel.title: Need help with Log4j [562]
channel.description:
This is a standard 562, with no add on, no 600+ junk. I get an error message saying the log4j is wrong, and won't let the client load.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE log4j:configuration SYSTEM "log4j.dtd">
<log4j:configuration xmlns:log4j="http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/">
<appender name="rs2hd" class="com.rs2hd.util.log.SLF4JAppender"> <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout"> <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%-5p %c{1} - %m%n"/> </layout> </appender>
<root> <priority value="all" /> <appender-ref ref="rs2hd" /> </root>
</log4j:configuration> //This is my log4j, does anyone thing they can help me fix this?
Example: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2a8rnld.png[/img]

item.title: Need help with Log4j [562]
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

This is a standard 562, with no add on, no 600+ junk. I get an error message saying the log4j is wrong, and won’t let the client load.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>

<log4j:configuration xmlns:log4j=“http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/”>

</log4j:configuration>
//This is my log4j, does anyone thing they can help me fix this?
